perturbation.original_text: ESSI engages Talent and Talent hereby accepts the engagement to act as a Spokesperson for ESSI, and to provide his endorsement of all ESSI products and services, domestically and worldwide.
perturbation.changed_text: ESSI engages Talent and Talent hereby accepts the engagement to act as a Brand Ambassador for ESSI, and to provide his endorsement of all ESSI products and services, domestically and worldwide.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Spokesperson' is replaced with 'Brand Ambassador' without defining if they carry the same obligations, which can create ambiguity when referencing back to other sections of the document where only 'Spokesperson' is used, thus potentially limiting the scope of the agreement.

perturbation.original_text: Talent will serve as a Special Advisor to ESSI, whose sole responsibility is to be listed as a brand ambassador on the Websites and/or ESSI related press releases. With respect to Talent's position as Special Advisory, Talent will not be responsible for any additional services such as attending meetings, corporate functions, etc.
perturbation.changed_text: Talent will serve as a Special Consultant to ESSI, whose sole responsibility is to be listed as a brand ambassador on the Websites and/or ESSI related press releases. With respect to Talent's position as Special Consultant, Talent may be required to perform additional services such as attending meetings and corporate functions, subject to additional compensation to be negotiated.
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Special Advisor' is replaced with 'Special Consultant', which may imply different expectations regarding the level of involvement and required services. Furthermore, the original text explicitly excludes additional services, while the modified version suggests they might be required, creating a direct contradiction and uncertainty on the scope of Talent's duties.

perturbation.original_text:
ESSI shall be solely responsible for all liability arising out of production, distribution and sale of its product(s). ESSI hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Talent, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as "Talent Indemnities") from and against any and all claims, actions, causes of action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorney fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Talent Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by ESSI of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by ESSI in this Agreement; or (2) ESSI product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by ESSI, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Talent; (ii) with the performance of ESSI's duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused.
13.1 ESSI shall not be obligated to indemnify Talent with respect to damages which are the result of the active negligence or willful misconduct of Talent.
perturbation.changed_text:
ESSI shall be primarily responsible for all liability arising out of production, distribution and sale of its product(s). ESSI hereby agrees to indemnify, defend and hold harmless Talent, his agents, representatives and employees (referred to collectively as "Talent Indemnities") from and against any and all claims, actions, causes of action, damages, injuries, expenses, liabilities (joint and several), penalties fines, attorney fees, court costs, and any other expenses incurred by Talent Indemnities arising out of (1) breach by ESSI of any of the terms, representations or warranties made by ESSI in this Agreement; or (2) ESSI product liability or trademark patent or other proprietary right infringement; or (3) errors, omissions, fraudulent or negligent acts by ESSI, its employees, agents or subcontractors in connection with (i) any advertising featuring Talent; (ii) with the performance of ESSI's duties and obligations under this Agreement; (iii) with the production, distribution, promotion, marketing and sales of products including related product packaging; and/or (iv) with the operation and management of its production and distribution facilities, however caused.
13.1 ESSI shall not be obligated to fully indemnify Talent with respect to damages which are the result of the active negligence or willful misconduct of Talent.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'solely responsible' to 'primarily responsible' introduces ambiguity regarding the extent of ESSI's liability. Similarly, changing 'indemnify Talent' to 'fully indemnify Talent' suggests that ESSI might have some level of indemnification responsibility even in cases of Talent's negligence or misconduct, which is contradictory to the initial statement. The text now leads to uncertainy around the level and limit of liability.
